about_the_game:
Maze, combine and conquer in Gem Miner TD, an indie tower defense game that puts you in the role of a crafty miner tasked with creating deadly mazes, combining powerful gems, and surviving waves of relentless enemies. With unique roguelike elements, every playthrough is a new adventure filled with strategic decisions and dazzling chaos.

Features

  • Craft Your Maze - Mine blocks to create intricate paths. Adjacent blocks become ore, transformable into powerful defensive gems.

  • Strategic Defense - Place gems to shoot down waves of enemies as they attempt to drag your miner to the lava pits.

  • Dynamic Gem System - Combine gems of varying rarities to create increasingly powerful defenses — the more you combine, the mightier your defenses become.

  • Roguelike Elements - After specific waves, choose from roguelike-style upgrades to customize your playstyle. Enhance your gems, empower your miner, or alter gameplay mechanics for a unique experience every run.

  • Diverse Challenges - Multiple maps, numerous miners, countless gem combinations, powerful augments, and varied enemy types make every playthrough feel fresh and exciting.

Maze...

Combine...

Conquer!

Colorful pixel graphics, deep strategy, and endless replayability await. Easy to play, hard to master! Are you ready to maze, combine and conquer? A tower defense where gem combinations and mazing lead to victory - wishlist now!

Join our Discord server!
